entries.message:
Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Warsaw location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2025-07-10 22:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2025-07-11 02:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Warsaw instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
